trans-unit.source: If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws the card.

trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当有牌手使用绿色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此做，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME成为横置时，它对你造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
